TopicTitle: How to make farings not be able to open

Articles.Content: Hello. I've been experimenting with making a starship in ksp1, and I keep accidentally opening the fairings that make the shape. How do i make them not be able to open?

How are you opening them accidentally? By staging? If so, you can r-click and choose not to have them staged, or moved them to the top of the stack where they won't be triggered and then manually discard them in flight.
